chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> degree m z = degree m (Iter (f m) i z)

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0 => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
f = M.f : fmap -> dart -> dart
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
degree = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => degree_aux m z 1 : fmap -> dart -> nat
dart = nat : Set
period_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter_upb m z = Iter_upb m (Iter (f m) i z)
degree_diff : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> forall i : nat, 0 < i < degree m z -> Iter (f m) i z <> z
expo_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> expo m z t -> degree m z = degree m t
upb_eq_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter_upb m z = degree m z
exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let n := Iter_upb m z in i <= n -> exds s (Iter (f m) i z)
Iter_f_f_1_i : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f_1 m) i (Iter (f m) i z) = z
degree_bound : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> degree m z <= ndN m
f_1_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> f_1 m (Iter (f m) (S i) z) = Iter (f m) i z
degree_lub : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := degree m z in 0 < p /\ Iter (f m) p z = z /\ (forall i : nat, 0 < i < p -> Iter (f m) i z <> z)
Iter_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i n : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in Iter (f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (f m) i z
Iter_plus_mult : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) p z = z -> Iter (f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (f m) i z
Iter_f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> j <= i -> Iter (f_1 m) j (Iter (f m) i z) = Iter (f m) (i - j) z
degree_pos : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> 0 < degree m z
Iter_f_Si : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) (S i) z = Iter (f m) i (f m z)
mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in {j : nat | Iter (f m) i z = Iter (f m) j z /\ j < p}
Iter_plus : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) (p + i) z = Iter (f m) i z -> Iter (f m) p z = z
Iter_plus_inv : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) p z = z -> Iter (f m) (p + i) z = Iter (f m) i z
Iter_f_1_Si : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f_1 m) (S i) z = Iter (f_1 m) i (f_1 m z)
not_exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), let sr := Iter_rem m z in let n := Iter_upb m z in i <= n -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z)
exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z)
Iter_mult : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n p : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) p z = z -> Iter (f m) (n * p) z = z
degree_per : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) (degree m z) z = z
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f m) n z)
unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in j < p -> k < p -> Iter (f m) j z = Iter (f m) k z -> j = k
M.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z
f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> M.f_1 m (M.f m z) = z
period_lub : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in 0 < nr /\ Iter (f m) nr z = z /\ (forall i : nat, 0 < i < nr -> Iter (f m) i z <> z)
ex_i_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in {i : nat | i < nr /\ Iter (f m) i z = Iter (f m) nr z}
ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := Iter_rem m z in let nr := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | i < nr /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
LR1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ndN m - card s <= i <= n -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z)
exd_Iter_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f_1 m) n z)
Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in Iter (f m) nr z = z
top_bottom_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
bottom_top_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (bottom m k z)
exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> diff_orb m z
exd_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (M.f m z)

```intros m z i Hmap Hexd.
induction i.
- simpl. reflexivity.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHi. symmetry. apply expo_degree.
  + apply Hmap.
  + apply Hexd.
  + apply Iter_period.
    * apply Hmap.
    * apply Hexd.
```

original: intros m z i Hmap Hexd. induction i. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHi. symmetry. apply expo_degree. + apply Hmap. + apply Hexd. + apply Iter_period. * apply Hmap. * apply Hexd.
